subject: Kayaks
Olympic Games (2012)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: As she enters her eighth Olympics, Josefa Idem says her goal now is to be able to tell women "that we can all be beautiful and achieve high goals at any age.''
snippet: As she enters her eighth Olympics, Josefa Idem says her goal now is to be able to tell women "that we can all be beautiful and achieve high goals at any age.''
